title: How to become an archaeologist (I live in India, and am currently in tenth grade) - Quora

response.answer_text: If you wish to pursue your higher education in India, you can do your undergrad in Ancient Indian History and do Post Grad in Archaeology from the Deccan College, Pune (Premier institute for studying archaeology in India). After that you can do a Ph.D on a topic of your specialization from the Institute of Archaeology, New Delhi. Following the completion of your higher education, you can get an employment offer from the Archaeological Survey of India, which is the final step to become a professional archaeologist.
